channel.title: MS-Paint, 3-D Objects
channel.description:
MS-Paint, 3-D Objects Hi all, I am starting this new topic as a gallery/showcase of 3-D Objects and things I draw in MS-Paint.
Here is a 3d- Pyramid: [img]http://doognotna.co.nz/3d-triangle.png[/img]
At the top: The solid object At the bottom: The reflection in the floor To the left: The shadow
Here is a Sphere: [img]http://doognotna.co.nz/ball.png[/img]
I will add more later
